title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7028.3 - Exercise within inmate housing units, cell corridors and day rooms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7028.3 - Exercise within inmate housing units, cell corridors and day rooms

State Regulations

Any exercise periods taking place within housing units
and available cell corridors and day rooms shall not fulfill the requirements
of providing exercise periods pursuant to this Part. However, exercise periods
taking place in direct supervision housing units shall fulfill the requirements
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

7028.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
